title: DC visits PNCA to review Independence Day arrangements
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 08 (APP):Deputy Commissioner Islamabad (DC) Irfan Nawaz Memon on Thursday visited Pakistan National Council of Arts (PNCA) to review the arrangements for the main event of Independence Day to be held on 14 August.
According to a spokesman, DC Islamabad also reviewed the security and parking arrangements and issued instructions on the spot.
Assistant Commissioner Secretariat and traffic police officials were also accompanied him.
